name: Tell Word
summary:
Meet "Tell Word"! This is a new card game with simple rules that will appeal to children and adults. The aim of the game is to find an appropriate words before the rest players did it. Hurry up, call your friends and dive into the fun atmosphere of the game!
More about the game The game consists of the Task cards and the Letter cards. First the task is selected, then the letter is opened. Players try to find an appropriate word to the current task, and the one who first say the word gets a winning score. At the end of the game the player with the most points wins.
